name: warehouse
description: POC: UI components for warehouse project

scripts.start: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 stage-0] ] -o src/bundle.js -v -d src/app.js
scripts.build: rm src/bundle.js && browserify . -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 stage-0] ] > src/bundle.js

author: Alan Waidmann
